description.narrative: Annual work planning for C4D and external communication undertaken through joint planning with sectoral programmes and relevant partners to inform the C4D workplan. Membership on technical teams particularly the Risk Communication and Community Engagement team influenced mainstreaming of normative C4D tools for covid-19 response including continuity of services despite the pandemic. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
